pages.text: $(li)Implemented a new config option for damage scaling. This option will multiply the damage dealt to players (before armor) from all sources in a basic or advanced dungeon. Defaults to 1.0x and 1.5x. $(li)Implemented a way to limit who can enter your personal dimension. For more information see that section of this book.

$(li)Mobs whose names fail to translate will not be nametagged. $(li)Fixed a crash when a vanilla mob fails to spawn. (Such as being prevented by Bad Mobs.) $(li)Removed the lag machines in two infamous rooms. $(li)Fixed a bug that prevented hardcore mode from working in the 1.18 and 1.19 ports.
